summary: Expand your ranged arsenal from just Bows and spells to include many types of throwable weapons  So far I have included Throwing Knives, Throwing Axes, Javelins, Throwable Potions, Grenades, a Throwing Shield(Captain Skyrims Shield), and a Throwing Hammer(Mjolnir)
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][b]Expand your ranged arsenal from just spells and arrows to bring[/b][/size][/center]
[center][size=8][b]Death From Afar[/b][/size][/center]

[center][color=RED][size=6][b]NOTICES[/b][/size][/color][/center]
[center][size=5]I\'m looking for someone to do a more up to date mod review or demonstration as the current ones show the older versions of the mod. PM or comment if your interested[/size][/center]

[center][img]http://SkyrimGEMS.com/images/badge_animated.gif[/img][/center]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23826][center][size=4][b](Category: 340 - Combat)[/b][/size][/center][/url]

[center][color=#0066FF][size=5][b]Introduction
=================================================================================[/b][/size][/color][/center]
Expand your ranged arsenal from just spells and arrows to bring Death From Afar! Throw Axes, Knives, Javelins, Potions, Grenades, Torches and more.

This mod adds a whole new style of combat to Skyrim, Throwing Weapons. Like many I was disappointed when throwing weapons did not make it across from Fallout: New Vegas so I have taken matters into my own hands.

The throwing weapons can complement most play styles, here are a selection of them:

For the assassins there are throwing knives; where speed is crucial for quick take downs and sneak bonuses offset the lower damage of the knives.
For the warriors there are throwing axes; hard hitting but slow they are great for softening up the enemy whilst you charge into combat
For long range skirmishers there are javelins; long ranged and accurate they are excellent for keeping enemies at bay
For the alchemists there are potion grenades; with many different effects, ranging from flaming oil to anti-undead holy water, your sure to be able strike any enemies weak spot.
For the archaeologists there are the Dwemer grenades; high explosives which will decimate large groups of enemies quickly

[center][color=#0066FF][size=5][b]Features
=================================================================================[/b][/size][/color][/center]
TThe throwing weapons are simple to use, just aim and throw. They can also be dual wielded with both conventional weapons and other throwing weapons.

To get hold of these weapons you can craft them yourself at any forge providing you have the correct smithing perks for the job
If your impatient, however, there is also a chest in Riverwood which contains all of the weapons in the mod. The chest can be found on the walkway above the Western entrance to Riverwood (Road leading from Helgen)

Followers can only be equipped with the throwing axes for the time being. So far all of the housecarls and the hirelings and follower Companions can use them. I will extend the NPC use to the knives, javelins, potions and grenades eventually.

Each type of throwing weapon is governed by a particular skill, using the weapons will train you in that skill aswell.
The Potion Grenades are governed by your Alchemy Skill
The Throwing Axes/Knives/Javelins are governed by your Archery Skill
The Dwemer Grenades will be governed by your Smithing Skill

The following equation is used by the weapons to calculate the damage
(Base Damage * (1 + ((Skill level/100) * 0.5))) * Perk multiplier

Therefore levelling your corresponding skill and investing in the perks which increase damage by a percentage will increase your damage output.

[center][color=#0066FF][size=5][b]Detailed Weapon List
=================================================================================[/b][/size][/color][/center]

[size=3][color=#0066FF]Throwing Axes[/color][/size]
[List]
[*]Iron Throwing Axe
[*]Steel Throwing Axe
[*]Dwarven Throwing Axe 
[*]Elven Throwing Axe 
[*]Orcish Throwing Axe 
[*]Glass Throwing Axe 
[*]Ebony Throwing Axe
[/List]
[size=3][color=#0066FF]Throwing Knives[/color][/size]
[List]
[*]Iron Throwing Knife
[*]Steel Throwing Knife
[*]Dwarven Throwing Knife
[*]Elven Throwing Knife
[*]Orcish Throwing Knife
[*]Glass Throwing Knife
[*]Ebony Throwing Knife
[*]Dragon Throwing Knife
[/List]
[size=3][color=#0066FF]Javelins[/color][/size]
[List]
[*]Iron Javelin
[*]Steel Javelin
[*]Orcish Javelin
[*](Issae has given me permission to use the previous Spear models from his Nordic Spears mod)
[*]Forsworn Javelin
[/List]
[size=3][color=#0066FF]Throwing Potions[/Color][/size]
[List]
[*]Frost Throwing Potion
[*]Gas Throwing Potion - Triggers flammable traps
[*]Oil Throwing Potion - Triggers flammable traps
[*]Poison Throwing Potion - Damages enemies over time
[*]Illusion Throwing Potion - Throw at your feet to make you invisible for several seconds
[*]Holy Water Throwing Potion - Harmless to the living, burns the undead.
[*]Paralyze Potion Grenade - Paralyzes opponents
[/List]
[size=3][color=#0066FF]Grenades[/Color][/size]
[List]
[*]Dwarven Force Grenade - Knocks over NPCs but does not damage them
[*]Dwarven Shock Grenade - Drains Mana
[/List]
[size=3][color=#0066FF]Misc[/Color][/size]
[List]
[*]Throwing Torch - Allows you to light distant areas
[/List]
[size=3][color=#0066FF]Special[/Color][/size]
[List]
[*]Combustible Lemons
[*]Throwing Shield - Knocks over enemies and returns to your hand
[*]Throwing Hammer(Mjolnir) - Staggers enemies and causes shock damage, returns to your hand.
[*]Fus Ro Dah Crystal - Acts like a fus ro dah shout but can be thrown
[*]Unstable Centurion Core - Hugely big and damaging explosion
[/list]

[center][color=#0066FF][size=5][b]Perk List
=================================================================================[/b][/size][/color][/center]
This is the list of perks along with its correspondings skill. I am currently still adding these perks. They can be found in the Perk Trees plugin.

[size=2][b][i]Alchemy[/i][/b][/size]
[list]
[*][color=Green]Glass Shards (1): Potions stagger opponents on direct hit (Implemented)[/color]
[*][color=Green]Corrosive Mixture (3): Each rank decreases an opponent’s armor resistance (Implemented)[/color]
[*]Chain Reaction (1): Chance for multiple splash damage to occur on hit

[size=2][b][i]Marksman[/i][/b][/size]
[*][color=Green]Balanced Axes (3): Each rank decreases the stamina cost power attacking with throwing Axes. (Implemented)[/color]
[*]Executioner (1): Chance to decapitate target
[*][color=Green]Piercing Wounds (3):  Adds bleed damage and each rank increases the amount of bleed damage. (Implemented)[/color]
[*][color=Green]Paired blades(1): Two knives are thrown per attack. (Implemented)[/color]
[*][color=Green]Impale (3): Each rank decreases an opponent’s armor resistance. (Implemented)[/color]
[*][color=Green]Force Throw (1): Javelins cause knockback (Implemented)[/color]
[*]Combat Strike (1): Chance to increase 1h and 2h damage for several seconds upon hit.

[size=2][b][i]Smithing[/i][/b][/size]
[*]Refined Powder (5): Each rank increases grenade damage by 20%
[*]Shell Shock(1): Grenades have a chance to cause fear
[*]Fragmentation (3): Adds bleed damage and each rank increases the amount of bleed damage.
[*]Soul Core(1): Grenades cause soul trap

[size=2][b][i]Sneak[/i][/b][/size]
[*][color=Green]Shadow Throw(1): Throwing weapons have 6X sneak bonus (Implemented)
[/list][/color]

[center][color=#0066FF][size=5][b]Bugs
=================================================================================[/b][/size][/color][/center]

[center][color=#0066FF][size=5][b]Readme
=================================================================================[/b][/size][/color][/center]

[center][color=RED][size=5][b]IF YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEMS PLEASE TRY THE THE README BEFORE POSTING[/b][/size][/color][/center]
[center][color=RED][size=3][b]IT CONTAINS AN INSTALLTION GUIDE, A QUICK START GUIDE, FAQ AND TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE[/b][/size][/color][/center]
 
[center][color=#0066FF][size=5][b]Miscellaneous
=================================================================================[/b][/size][/color][/center]
This mod was originally posted on Steam Workshop and can be found [b][url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=15294&searchtext=]HERE[/url][/b]

This mod also has a thread on the bethsoft forums which can be found [b][url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1366119-notice-throwing-weapons-how-did-we-miss-this-mod]HERE[/url][/b]

Thanks to theycallmecheese for use of his dragon dagger model. You can find his Dragonbone Weapon pack [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14701]HERE[/url][/b]

Thanks to issae for use of his spear models. You can find his Nordic Spears mod that they came from [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15294]HERE[/url][/b]

Thanks to [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=142818]asc_kel[/url][/b] for his weapon models, if you have any questions/suggestions about the way the weapons look this is your go to guy.

[center][color=#0066FF][size=5][b]Currently Working On
================[/b][/size][/color]
Increased Damage from Power Attacks
Adding throwing weapons to more Vendors and Loot
General Tweaks
[/center]

[center][color=#0066FF][size=5][b]Planned Targets
================[/b][/size][/color]
Fused Potions (Timed)
Proximity Bombs
Ammo retrieval spells
[/center]
author: Madrilous

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Throwing shield is now removable and using a block bash on other weapons no longer causes the shield to fire
Crafting recipe for throwing knives has been added
Tempering recipe for the shield has been added
Shield stats have been increased
A Fus Ro Dah crystal has been added which can be thrown.

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 1_2
files.changelogHtml:
Added Throwing Hammer (Mjolnir)
Added Javelin Prototype

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 1_2_1
files.changelogHtml:
Added Steel Javelin + Steel Throwing Knife
Fixed the javelin collision issues
Modified Knife Holding positions
Reduced the visual effect intensity of the force grenade
Improved damage of the frost Potions

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 2_0_0
files.changelogHtml:
Added NPC use of throwing axes (limited number of NPCs)
Fixed the deletion the dropped items
Fixed missing weapon models
Changed Steel throwing knife model

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 2_1_0
files.changelogHtml:
Addition of perks for the throwing potions
Alchemy now levels with the use of throwing potions
Throwing potion damage now scales with your alchemy level
Added hirelings to the list of followers that can use the throwing axes

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 2_1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed the throwing axes not having a damage value
Added some preliminary work for an improvement of the followers use of throwing weapons

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 3_0_0
files.changelogHtml:
Implemented an overhaul of the way followers used throwing weapons
Made followers more effective with throwing axes
Added more perks to the Marksman skill tree
Improved damage and skill leveling calculations for Axes, Knives and Javelins

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 3_1_0
files.changelogHtml:
Added Dwarven/Elven/Orchish/Glass/Ebony knives to the mod
Updated the housecarls and the hirelings to work with the updated NPC throwing weapons
Changed the handheld model of the torch to be lit.
Split the riverwood chest into two separate chests. One for Axe/Knives/Javelins the other for Potions/Grenades/Misc

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 3_2_0
files.changelogHtml:
Added Dragon throwing knives
Fixed a bug where weapons would continue to throw if you ran out of \'ammo\' and equipped a non throwable weapon
Made a slight improvement to the NPCs throwing axe accuracy.

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 3_3_0
files.changelogHtml:
Overhauled Damage system for Knives/Axes/Javelins to bring in line with how the rest of the game handles damage calculation.
Added two new perks, Force Throw and Paired Blades
Fixed a few problems with the Orcish Knives
Made the throwing knives silent, should work better when sneaking.
Added combustible lemons

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 3_3_1
files.changelogHtml: Added a clear clutter feature. Thrown weapons left on the ground will disappear after a few minutes if the player is not around

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 3_4_0
files.changelogHtml:
Added new javelin models and an orcish javelin
Fixed a bug where weapons would drop as well as being thrown
Fixed a bug where smithing level would greatly increase after smithing knives.
Slightly improved the accuracy of followers use of throwing Axes.

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 3_5_0
files.changelogHtml:
Added the embedding and retrieval of throw knives and javelins.
Added some preliminary work for the sneak system

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 4_0_0
files.changelogHtml:
Implemented Sneak bonus for throwing knives, axes and javelins
Added Shadow Throw Perk (x6 Sneak damage for thrown weapons)
Fixed the bug where smithing jumped up to 90+ when crafting the thrown weapons
Fixed the mid-air frost effect that sometimes happened when frost potions were thrown

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 4_1_0
files.changelogHtml:
Implemented Embedding/Retrieval for Axes
Weapons embedded into enemies have a 30% chance of being added to their inventory
Added Forsworn Javelin
Fixed bug where a weapon was added once you used your last throwing weapon (basically infinite throwing weapons)
Fixed the potions sometimes giving 1h experience

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 4_2_0
files.changelogHtml:
Added Illusion Throwing Potion, throw it at your feet to make yourself inivisible
Added Forsworn Throwing Axe
Minor bug fixes to improve the overall quality

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 5_0_1
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed Bows not working
Fixed abilities and shouts not being able to be assigned
Fixed Throwing Shield not being visible
Made Holy Water Potion Grenades Craftable

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 5_1_0
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed unlimited ammo bug
Added Freeze Effect to the Frost Potions
Vastly improved the damage of knives, axes and javelins and balanced Speed/Range
Added compatibility with the Deadly Traps mod

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 5_2_0
files.changelogHtml:
Removed embedded looping sound
Fixed the red reticule that sometimes appeared
Fixed not being able to jump after throwing
Fixed Mjolnir Throwing and Captain Skyrim Shield\'s armor value
Frost Potions now only freeze enemies below 30% health
Fixed compatibility issues with animation based mods (Namely Dwemer Exoskeleton)
Fixed Sneak multipliers and improved Sneak detection calculations
Removed Perk Trees to allow compatibility with ACE and SkyRE

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 5_2_1
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed the crafting recipes for knives, potions and grenades again
Fixed the explosion and sound for the Force grenade

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 5_2_3
files.changelogHtml: Fixed the Captain Skyrim Shield Body Armor bug.

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 5_3_0
files.changelogHtml:
Removed the Special Weapons and added them as a plugin file.
Add the perk trees as a plugin file

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 5_4_0
files.changelogHtml:
Improved weapon retrieval
Fixed invisible weapons appearing in mid-air
Improved AoE damage calculations of Potion Grenades
Improved Sneak Calculations
Added Dwarven Frag Grenade
Fixed Overdraw Perks not effecting damage
Multiple Minor Fixes.

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 5_4_1
files.changelogHtml: Fixed delayed throwing glitch in 5.4.0

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 5_5_0
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed Illusion potion looping sound and added explosion sound
Fixed Frag Grenade Explosion not showing.
Numerous small fixes and tweaks
Added Support for Throwing Weapons \'Quivers\' Plugin
Added Leveled Lists Plugin

files.name: Throwing Weapons Version 6_0_0
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed sneak attacks
Fixed sneak power attacks breaking throwing
Added damage bonus for power attacks
Added new potion grenade models
Modified the throwing knives to be smaller and more realistic
Added a Shuriken (Iron)
Numerous other fixes
